Missouri_City.Elkins High School (Missouri City, Texas: Lawrence E. Elkins High School, more commonly known as Elkins High School is a public high school in Missouri City, Texas that serves communities in Sugar Land and Missouri City. The school, which handles grades 9 through 12, is a part of the Fort Bend Independent School District. Elkins was established in 1992, with its first graduating class in 1995.
